EmailTemplate.name: Close Date Over Due
EmailTemplate.subject: Close Date Overdue Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.OwnerFullName},
The Close Date for the Lead {!Lead.Name} is Over due by a couple of days. Please take the necessary action on the lead to accomplish conversion of the lead.
Click on the following link to go to the Lead's page: {!Lead.Name}
Regards, FFreedom Team.
